Item.StudentDirections: Student Directions are optional. To add them to a particular Item, use the Insert Student Directions Toolbar button.

LeadIn.P: Lead In is optional. To add to a particular Item, use the Insert Lead In Toolbar button. A Lead In may contain P paragraphs, Graphics, Text Boxes, Directions, Excerpts, Ordered Lists, Unordered Lists or Equations.

Passage.P: Stimulus is optional. To add a Stimulus to an Item, use the Insert Stimulus Toolbar button.
Every Stimulus requires either a Graphic, Heading, Directive or Passage.

Stem.P: Add required Stem here. A Stem may contain P paragraphs, Graphics, Text Boxes, Ordered Lists, Unordered Lists, and Equations.

Comments.Comment: This is a Comment within a sample Item. To add a Comment, use the Insert Comment Toolbar button. Please either replace the content in this Item or delete this Item from your document after adding in your own Item content from the repository.
